MESSAGING.DESC: Secure direct messaging between parents and teachers with read receipts.

GALLERY.TITLE: Photo Gallery
GALLERY.DESC: Share precious moments with parents through a secure photo gallery.

PAYMENTS.TITLE: Online Payments
PAYMENTS.DESC: Accept tuition and fee payments online with Stripe integration.

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Push Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.DESC: Real-time notifications keep everyone informed and connected.

STEP1.TITLE: Sign Up Your Daycare
STEP1.DESC: Create your account and set up your daycare profile in minutes.

STEP2.TITLE: Add Children & Parents
STEP2.DESC: Easily enroll children and invite parents to connect.

STEP3.TITLE: Start Managing
STEP3.DESC: Track attendance, share updates, and manage your daycare effortlessly.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Download MiniMinds Today
DOWNLOAD.SUBTITLE: Stay connected with your child's daycare anytime, anywhere. Download our mobile app for iOS and Android devices.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Transform Your Daycare?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Join hundreds of daycares already using MiniMinds to streamline their operations.

MESSAGES.NEW_FEE: A new fee of {{amount}} has been added for {{childName}}. Due date: {{dueDate}}
MESSAGES.NEW_EVENT: A new event '{{eventName}}' has been scheduled. Check it out!
MESSAGES.TEST_NOTIFICATION: This is a test notification to verify the system works.

ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
ERRORS.TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again.
ERRORS.SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
ERRORS.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action.
ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
ERRORS.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found.
ERRORS.EDUCATOR_NOT_FOUND: Educator not found. They may have been deleted.
ERRORS.CHILD_NOT_FOUND: Child not found. They may have been removed.
ERRORS.PARENT_NOT_FOUND: Parent not found. They may have been deleted.
ERRORS.DUPLICATE_EMAIL: This email address is already registered.
ERRORS.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 6 characters.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQUIRES_DIGIT: Password must contain at least one digit (0-9).
ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQUIRES_LOWER: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQUIRES_UPPER: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQUIRES_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).
ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQUIRES_UNIQUE: Password must contain more unique characters.
ERRORS.NO_ACTIVE_CLASSES: This educator has no active classes. Please assign them to a class first before adding children.
ERRORS.CHILD_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: This child is already assigned to this educator's class.
